answers.answer: Are you a male or female?

question: For about a week I've had dull pain on R side of tummy, below waist. I feel bloated in stomach, went several days without BM, took colace, had BM every day for 3 days. Just did treadmill and felt the dull tummy pain on R side again. I also feel a little heartburn and like food isn't going below my waist.  Any ideas? I've had regular colonoscopy, have gall bladder removed, a lot of loose stools after eating something fatty, have diabetes, 61 years old. Thanks so much.
title: bloating, dull tummy pain
